dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Extends Cache::SizeAwareMemoryCache
dependencies.name: perl-cache-cache

dependencies.name: perl-carp-assert

dependencies.name: perl-class-load

dependencies.name: perl-data-uuid

dependencies.name: perl-digest-jhash

dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in Hash::Util
dependencies.name: perl-hash-moreutils

dependencies.name: perl-json-maybexs

dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util
dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils

dependencies.name: perl-log-any

dependencies.description: Pretend certain modules are not installed
dependencies.name: perl-module-mask

dependencies.name: perl-moox-types-mooselike

dependencies.description: Rewrite strings based on a set of known prefixes
dependencies.name: perl-string-rewriteprefix

dependencies.description: Ensure that a platform has weaken support
dependencies.name: perl-task-weaken

dependencies.name: perl-test-class

dependencies.name: perl-time-duration

dependencies.name: perl-time-duration-parse

dependencies.description:
The parser contained here will only parse absolute dates, if you want a
date parser that can parse relative dates then take a look at the Time
modules by David Muir on CPAN.
dependencies.name: perl-timedate

dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny
